DOC.brief_summary: Prompt access to care and treatment adherence are the hearth of tuberculosis control. This is a multicentre observational prospective study aimed at studying the factors associated with delayed access to care and low adherence to anti-tuberculosis treatment. Hetero- and self-administered questionnaires will be used at enrollment to assess clinical presentation and time and modalities of the diagnosis. Treatment adherence will be assessed during the follow-up with self administered questionnaires.
DOC.brief_title: Access to Care and Adherence Tuberculosis (TB) Survey
DOC.criteria: >= 18 yrs of age recent new TB diagnosis Tuberculosis treatment prescribed Ability to sign the informed consent
